headline: Trump Vs. DJ D-Sol: President Tells Goldman Sachs CEO David Solomon To 'Focus On Being A DJ' Instead Of Finance
summary: Shares of Goldman Sachs Group (NYSE:GS) hit new all-time highs Tuesday, which might come as a surprise given an attack against the company and their CEO David Solomon by President Donald Trump. What Happened: On the heels of a Consumer Price Index that saw core inflation come in higher than expected, Trump lashed out at several individuals in the financial markets, including Solomon and Federal Reserve Chairman Jerome Powell. headline: Trump’s DJing taunt at Goldman CEO signals that tariff fight is getting personal

headline: Another Big-Time Executive Is Hearing It From Trump. This Time It's Goldman's CEO.
summary: President Donald Trump leaned on a big bank's CEO on Tuesday, a day after appearing to make peace with a chipmaking chief.

headline: Trump Calls on Goldman to Replace Economist Over Tariff Stance
summary: President Trump on Tuesday appeared to call for  Goldman Sachs  Chief Executive  David Solomon  to replace the bank’s top economist over his past predictions, in his latest broadside against executives he believes are undermining his goals.  Trump said on his Truth Social social-media platform that Solomon should “go out and get himself a new Economist” because the bank made a “bad prediction a long time ago” on the market and tariffs.  The president asserted that tariffs haven’t caused inflation or other issues for the U.S. economy.

The president asserted that tariffs haven’t caused inflation or other issues for the U.S. economy.

headline: Trump tells Goldman Sachs boss to stick to DJing
summary: Donald Trump told the boss of Goldman Sachs to “focus on being a DJ” after the Wall Street bank warned that the US president’s tariff campaign threatened the American economy.

raw.headline: Trump tells Goldman Sachs boss to stick to DJing

headline: Trump rebukes Goldman's Solomon over bank's tariff research
summary: The bank CEO is the latest corporate boss to become the target of Trump's ire, and the situation shows the sensitivity corporations face about tariffs.  Goldman is the latest Wall Street bank to face pressure, after Trump criticized JPMorgan Chase and Bank of America over alleged debanking, or refusing to provide banking services to individuals.

raw.headline: Trump rebukes Goldman's Solomon over bank's tariff research

headline: Trump blasts Goldman over tariff forecasts, tells David Solomon to 'focus on being a DJ'
summary: President Trump took issue with the Goldman Sachs research team, which initially forecast that stocks would decline this year and the US economy would enter a recession in the wake of Trump's April tariff announcements.

raw.headline: Trump blasts Goldman over tariff forecasts, tells David Solomon to 'focus on being a DJ'

headline: Trump criticizes Goldman Sachs over tariff predictions
summary: Investing.com -- President Trump criticized Goldman Sachs and its CEO David Solomon on Tuesday for their predictions about tariffs, claiming the investment bank was wrong about the market impact of his trade policies.

raw.headline: Trump criticizes Goldman Sachs over tariff predictions

headline: Dow Poised to Break CPI Day Losing Streak
summary: The Dow Jones Industrial Average is liking inflation data for a change. The blue-chip index was recently up 1%, on track for its first day of gains for a “CPI day” since January. Big gainers in the index included UnitedHealth and Goldman Sachs, both up more than 3%.

headline: ‘Just Focus on Being a DJ’—Trump Attacks Goldman CEO Over Tariffs
summary: President Trump lashed out at Goldman Sachs and Chief Executive David Solomon, days after the bank said U.S. consumers are likely to bear the bulk of costs caused by tariffs.  In a Truth Social post, Trump claimed companies and foreign governments were picking up the tab for most of the import taxes he is introducing.  “I think that David should go out and get himself a new Economist or, maybe, he ought to just focus on being a DJ, and not bother running a major Financial Institution.”

raw.headline: ‘Just Focus on Being a DJ’—Trump Attacks Goldman CEO Over Tariffs
